text: Heliotropium aff. wagneri is an undescribed plant in the family Boraginaceae. It resembles Heliotropium wagneri, but differs in fruits breaking up into four nutlets and flowers that are always yellow, never white. Endemic to Samhah in Yemen, its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical dry lowland grassland and rocky shores. ==References== aff. wagneri Category:Endemic flora of Socotra Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Undescribed plant species Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
